title: The Governor

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, Deploy a soldier at a player's house.
- During the day, add or remove any number of players to/from your list of "Enemies".

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Soldiers are Deployed indefinitely, only leaving after scaring or roleblocking someone.
- You do not visit your target. Your soldiers are the ones acting, not you.
- Soldiers will scare away all Enemies from their house. You'll be notified which Enemies attempted to visit them.
- If a player with a Deployed soldier attempts to visit an Enemy, they'll be roleblocked. You'll be notified who they attempted to visit.

desc:
Post 4586
*A crooked opportunist. Deals in whiskey and gold -- human vices that need piles of bodies to maintain.*
